Articles.Content: Hello I have a challenge for anyone to try to do. My challenge is make two reusable rocket booster and strap them both of the sides of a space station to de-orbit it. Next stage the boosters and de-orbit them both, Finally de-orbit them all and safely bring them all back. Or you could just do it with the one booster and no space station whatever you prefer.

Hi!

Thanks for the suggestion, but i think the goal is a bit too vague for most people. Challenges posted should have somewhat clear targets, or should be challenging. "just" landing a booster has been done before.

Also, people like a scoring system, always nice to be the "best" at something

Keep it up!
Hi, that was my first post made and I thought it would be a fun challenge at the time. But know that I think of it it's really not that hard to do. Thanks for replying!
